text: Tania Vanessa Rincón Sánchez (born December 15, 1986 in La Piedad, Michoacán) is a Mexican model and television presenter. After winning the 2006 Nuestra Belleza Michoacán pageant, Tania Rincón obtained the right of representing her state in the national Nuestra Belleza México 2006 competition, in which she eventually reached the top 10 and was presented with the contest's annual Academic Award.Tania Rincón: Orgullosa de sus orígenes Rincón later went on to pursue a television career and became host of Fox Sports Latinoamérica's Lo mejor de Fox Sports¡Así fue el adiós a Tania Rincón en FOX Sports! and also joined the cast of the entertainment morning talk show Venga la alegría on TV Azteca.Venga la alegría - Tania Rincón In August 2014, Rincón helped to raise awareness of the disease ALS by participating in the Ice Bucket Challenge. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican female models Category:Mexican television presenters Category:Mexican beauty pageant winners Category:People from La Piedad Category:Models from Michoacán Category:Women television presenters
title: Tania Rincón
